page.title: 18Employment Survey
page.content: The parents of children were asked to fill in a questionnaire giving occupations of adults living in the household.Seventy households responded to the request,giving a sample of 139 adults in the village of Charnock Richard.} TYPE OF EMPLOYMENT NUMBER % Manual 5 3.60 Skilled Manual 40 28.77 Office & Administration 19 13.70 Professional 18 12.94 Public Service 13 9.34 Farming & Agriculture 6 4.31 Housewife 20 14.38 Hotel/Restaurant 7 5.05 Shops/Sales 9 6.47 Others 1 0.72 Unemployed 1 0.72 139 100.00
